cells.data:
After searching for weeks I have found a technique that actually works:

Using this command

I get this message:

10-06 18:48:15.445 12293-12321/com.sanctuaryofdarkness.steambot I/DARRELL: Print to console

I filter out everything else with this filter:



Used here:


In logCat in the Android Monitor. By always using the tag ‘DARRELL’, I can always find the message in the console by filtering out everything else.
